pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Regularized Canonical Correlation Analysis // Contains the core functions associated with Fast Regularized Canonical Correlation Analysis. Please see the following for details: Raul Cruz-Cano, Mei-Ling Ting Lee, Fast regularized canonical correlation analysis, Computational Statistics Data Analysis, Volume 70, 2014, Pages 88-100, ISSN 0167-9473 doi:10.1016/j.csda.2013.09.020.
